name: Rachit Taneja
tagline: Aspiring full-stack engineer focused on mastering Web Development and AI.
description: I am a first-year CSE student building strong foundations in Web Development, JavaScript, React, and AI. I am actively building projects like PromptVault, JavaScript Playground, and my personal portfolio. I also completed the McKinsey Forward Program (certificate expected December), where I learned structured problem-solving, effective communication, digital adaptability, and modern professional skills.
mckinsey_summary: The McKinsey Forward Program trained me in five core areas: adaptable learning (APR technique, habit loops, mindset reframing), structured problem-solving (7-step hypothesis-led approach, SMART problem statements, MECE, prioritization matrices), impactful communication (EPIC framework, active listening, Pyramid Principle), well-being and collaboration (AVEC relationship model, psychological safety via REACH), and digital readiness (data literacy, technology awareness, design thinking, and agile ways of working).
